full_text:
After authorized signs have been erected giving notice thereof, it shall be unlawful to make a left turn, right turn, or a straight-through movement, respectively, at the locations set out in official Traffic Schedule No. 8, Restricted turns at or between intersections. 
Cross reference: Schedules incorporated by reference, §11-2004

4.catch_line: RIGHT TURNS ON RED TRAFFIC CONTROL SIGNAL LIGHTS PROHIBITED.

next_section.catch_line: RIGHT TURNS ON RED TRAFFIC CONTROL SIGNAL LIGHTS PROHIBITED.

plain_text:
CODE OF STATE

TURNING AT OR BETWEEN INTERSECTIONS. (§ 11-2104)

After authorized signs have been erected giving notice thereof, it shall be
unlawful to make a left turn, right turn, or a straight-through movement,
respectively, at the locations set out in official Traffic Schedule No. 8,
Restricted turns at or between intersections. 
Cross reference: Schedules incorporated by reference, §11-2004
